captions.text:
Normally by this age,
most people experience something big in life.
And that changed my life completely.

You are the only witness to what happened
with the ticket collector.

That's why you have to 
come to Komban Village with us.

My dad commands a lot of respect
in Komban Village.

He is a... do you know...
Peri-ya-tha-lai?
It sure doesn’t seem like a holiday!

Don't underestimate the power of
a common man.

Hey Meenama, the word 'impossible'
doesn't exist in my dictionary.

Where did you pick up
such a useless dictionary?
Ever since you walked into my life…
Why did you slide towards me?

comments.text:
(寶萊塢愛情特快車)最好笑的一段，男主角被丟到一艘公海的走私油船，一出船艙說：「life of pi 
？(少年PI的奇幻漂流)」這個不夠好。之後，船員說：「如果在巴基斯坦被抓就在巴基斯坦関」，「如果在印度被抓，就在印度関」，如果都沒被抓，那就「太好了」，這是影射「三個傻瓜」的主題曲：all 
is well，而，英文字幕打出來是「oil is well」，走私油的當然要說「油很好」。哈哈哈哈，害我笑好久。。。
Chennai Express | Official Trailer 2013 | Shah Rukh Khan | Deepika Padukone﻿
comments.author: 朱約信

comments.text: 早安

comments.text:
I do appreciate the action sequences in Don 2 and the foreign locations and 
I also know that Farhan Akhtar is one of the best directors who is very 
sophisticated. However, he could have done a better job. What I did not 
like about Don 2 is that firstly, Don keeps talking about himself like 'Don 
ko pakadna mushkil hi nahi...'. My point is that why does Don keep praising 
himself and how is he so intelligent that he can never be fooled by any of 
his enemies. Not even Einstein was that intelligent.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:
I am sure he must have joked. Every time, the media creates unnecessary 
controversies between the superstars. This time, Salman thought of having 
fun with the media. I never mind anything Salman says, because I know for a 
fact, that guy has a clean heart and no ego issues. I don't care what 
people think of him, but he is Aamir's close friend and a very good 
entertainer, and so, I like him.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:
Now, this is the problem with you SRK fans. If someone says that he doesn't 
like a particular film of SRK, you feel bad and take offense and start 
criticizing that guy's favourite actor's films. If I don't like JTHJ, then 
Talaash becomes bad and if I don't like Mohabbatein, then Fanaa becomes 
bad. Why can't you handle criticism in a positive manner? Any film can have 
flaws in it.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

bro i am not blaming aamir khan but i am blaming the script. i mean talaash

comments.author: Veer Singh

comments.text:
Kareena's character or rather soul was searching for peace as she had been 
left to die and nobody had even cared to know what happened to her. 
Nawazzudin's character was searching for a way to get out of the 
prostitution business. So, if you try to understand the film in this way, 
then you will understand what is the idea of the film and why Aamir wanted 
to do it. Now, I leave it to you to like or dislike the film. :)
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:
@Veer Singh Dude, I am your friend and I won't force you to like Talaash or 
any film for that matter. But I just want to say that the ghost angle in 
Talaash was in the story because Talaash is a film which is about how 
different people are searching for something in their lives. See, Aamir's 
character was searching for peace because he had lost his son, Rani's 
character was searching for happiness because her relationship with her 
husband had become bad.(Contd.)
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

like it which is ok. Again, from a suspense film, the focus shifted to the 
topic of losing a loved one, like Inspector Shekhawat will lose his son.

Aamir's Fanaa with YRF is a very memorable film for me. I just loved Aamir 
and Kajol in it. I still love to hear the songs from Fanaa. By doing Fanaa,

comments.text:
Actually dude, I have watched almost every film of Shahrukh with Yash Raj 
Films except DTPH and Darr. Trust me, I want to sit down and watch these 
two films someday. Films of SRK with YRF that I liked were - DDLJ, 
Veer-Zaara and Chak de! India and the films that I did not like were- 
Mohabbatein, RNBDJ and JTHJ. So, for me, every film is different and at the 
end of the day, it either makes a good impression on me or it does not 
make. As simple as that. :)

comments.text:
If you compare JTHJ with Talaash, Aamir Khan had the company of two better 
heroines in Kareena and Rani. Both of them acted very well and gave very 
good support to Aamir. And everybody loved the 3 of them while watching the 
movie. SRK, on the other hand, did not get that kind of support. It's not 
compulsory for a romantic film to have an amazing script but it has to 
touch your heart in the end. Somehow, JTHJ could not do that for me.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:
@Praveen Dude, I have no problem with you having liked JTHJ. But the truth 
is that Katrina and Anushka are not fit to be in Yash Chopra's films 
because they are not good actors. Other Yash Chopra heroines such as Juhi, 
Madhuri, Rani and Preity were much better than them. You can't disagree on 
this with me. And as a result, the film's success depended on SRK's 
performance. So whatever good he did, was the final result as far as JTHJ 
is concerned.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:

comments.text:

comments.text:
In every YRF romantic films and Dharma prod. films of SRK,emotions played 
important role not good scripts.but that doesn't mean these films has bad 
scripts.That's why every films of SRK seems romantic and in every films in 
every year he acts from his heart this is the only thing which make me his 
fan and make him almost every year the best actor.JTHJ is such film that I 
have awaited me a lot.I think this film has the same weight like films 
VZ,mohabbatein,DDLJ,DTPH,K3G,KKHH.
comments.author: Praveen Sarathi

comments.text:
I totally disagree with you.you said JTHJ has not good script that's true a 
romantic doesn't need script like other reality films like ETT.then I want

no.1 film.the main thing behind these kind film is how these films hold the

then only you can understand what is JTHJ.

comments.author: Veer Singh

comments.text:
The script of JTHJ could've been much better. And for ETT, well when Salman 
is there, does the film even need a script? I don't think so. Actually, 
expecting a sensible film from Salman Khan is the same as expecting a 
non-sensical film from Aamir Khan! So, when I sit and watch a Salman Khan 
film, I only expect entertainment, nothing more, nothing less.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text:
@Praveen No, Dhoom 3's trailer is not out yet. The new motion poster is out 
and if you haven't watched it, do watch it because it's very good. I 
personally liked ETT more than JTHJ. There are reasons for that. But the 
best reason I can give you is that ETT was a much better film compared to 
Bodyguard and Dabangg and very entertaining! On the other hand, SRK has 
done better romantic films like DDLJ and Veer-Zaara compared to JTHJ.
comments.author: Arpan Baishya

comments.text: hey was dhoom3 trailor out in october2?
